title: Manage Lab Instrument Calibration
description: A lab technician must ensure a critical analytical balance is calibrated correctly before use.

tasks.description: Check the calibration status of the analytical balance in the equipment log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the daily calibration check is due.

tasks.description: Perform the calibration check using a set of certified weights.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs the check and finds the balance is reading outside of the acceptable tolerance.

tasks.description: Place an 'Out of Service' tag on the balance and log the failure in the equipment management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tags the equipment and creates a maintenance request.
